adrFormatAddress: 518 E 20th St, New York, NY 10009, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Elizabeth Choi is a terrific doctor. My whole family sees her. She is kind and responds quickly to concerns. We never feel rushed, as so often happens with other doctors.

text.text: Dr. Elizabeth Choi is a terrific doctor. My whole family sees her. She is kind and responds quickly to concerns. We never feel rushed, as so often happens with other doctors.

originalText.text: Dr. Choi is by far the most thorough primary care doctor I’ve seen living in NYC for over 20 years. She takes her time and goes over your entire family history, lifestyle, asks pertinent questions and provides best practices for optimal health without judgment. You don’t feel rushed at all and ample time for questions and addressing any concerns. I credit her listening and diagnostic skills in directing me to the right follow up imaging and screenings and incredibly thankful to have such a wonderful provider locally.

originalText.text: Dr. Choi is the best doctor I have ever seen. She’s very professional and she’s also very thorough. Her personality is perfect for the position that she has. She really takes an interest in her patients.

text.text: Dr. Choi is the best doctor I have ever seen. She’s very professional and she’s also very thorough. Her personality is perfect for the position that she has. She really takes an interest in her patients.

originalText.text: Dr. Choi is caring and thorough. She is able to put me at ease when discussing the most difficult issues. I feel like I can trust her with my health

text.text: Dr. Choi is caring and thorough. She is able to put me at ease when discussing the most difficult issues. I feel like I can trust her with my health

originalText.text: The care and explanations coupled with Dr. Choi’s thoroughness leaves nothing left to perfect. Can’t say enough for this entire team. Good job! THANK YOU.
